member.name: MIMEASSOCIATIONDIALOG_IN_FLAGS
member.summary: Used with the function to determine how it executes.

member.name: MIMEASSOCIATIONDIALOG_IN_FLAGS.MIMEASSOCDLG_FL_REGISTER_ASSOC
member.summary: If this bit is set, the selected application is registered as the handler for the given MIME type. If this bit is clear, no association is registered.
